description:
When Yuma learns that Shark is going to be set up to take the fall for stealing a priceless deck, Yuma challenges Shark’s thug friends to a duel!  Can Yuma put a stop to The Pack’s thieving plan and save Shark’s skin, or will these thugs prove too powerful for Yuma and his deck?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuuma to Shark, Kizu Darake no Tag Duel
遊馬(ゆうま)とシャーク 傷だらけのタッグデュエル
